title: How to Watch the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics, From Peacock to TikTok
sub_head: Cord-cutters can stream the entire Olympic lineup this year, mainly via NBCUniversal’s Peacock service—but that isn’t the only way to catch the Winter Games
body:
The streaming era makes watching anything more complicated, and the 2022 Olympic Winter Games in Beijing are no exception.
In the old days, you could flip through your cable TV guide and tune in to the right channel. You can still do that if you haven’t cut the cord—or have an antenna. But now, with NBC and its parent companies operating various streaming apps and social-media channels, you can see a lot more, both live and on demand—if you know where to look.
